name: Bullet Tron
description:
Bullet Tron:

You are the blue guy, the enemies are the red guys. You have to shoot the red guys. Be careful, one touch from the enemies and your dead, GAME OVER. Try to beat the default high-score (10,000)pts !

Controls:

Use the mouse cursor to aim.

Left-click to shoot.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Enemies:

All enemies are worth 200 points and have 3 HP

Credits:

Pixel Art made with Aseprite 1.2.25.

HD Art made with Clip Studio Paint.

Game made with Godot Engine 3.2.

SFX made with jsfxr.
